title: Did President Trump choose that scientists say "stupid " to existing believing dinosaurs?
subtitle: Although Sam Clovis believes he's in line for the appointment of the Ministry of Agriculture, he did not say that scientists are "stupid" and that dinosaurs are "deception."
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: Did Sam Clovis (President Trump choose for the US Department of Agriculture) call scientists "dumb" and claim that dinosaurs did not exist?
